Articles.Content:
I just discovered SpaceX is recruiting A LOT, and not just rocket specialists.

http://www.spacex.com/careers/list

It will be significantly easier for US citizens because of various aerospace and defense rules, and I guess a few people here could be interested.
Are there any jobs available as a janitor?
Hmm, I never would have thought of applying to them... Once I'm done with school maybe I'll make a try for one of their programming jobs.
Nothing in Houston? I figured they'd have something.
Shame they don't need a gunsmith
